properties.address: Buccleuch House, 4 South Hermitage Street, Newcastleton, Scottish Borders TD9 0QR
properties.description: Open from 09-01-2023. Join us in a warm, friendly space. On Tuesdays we will be providing soup and a roll between 12 and 1pm. We have a wide programme of activities, come along and join in..
properties.title: Newcastleton and District Community Trust

properties.description: This is a community centre with teas and coffees available throughout this session and some refreshments. There will be board games / jigsaws, access to TV facilities. A great opportunity to socialise with others. Open to all ages.We will provide teas and coffees. In addition there will be refreshments each week. This will vary week to week and will be advertised within the centre and on social media.
properties.title: Longtown Memorial Hall Community Centre

properties.description: Wi fi and company. Hot drinks .Bar open Thursday and Friday Food can be purchased on Friday 6.30 until 9pm
properties.title: Nicholforest Village Hall
